entry.title: Born at China’s WeBank, now incubating in the ASF - Introducing Apache EventMesh
entry.id: Born at China’s WeBank, now incubating in the ASF - Introducing Apache EventMesh
entry.summary: Guangsheng Chen, the founder of Apache EventMesh, has been buzzing since the project was welcomed into the Apache Software Foundation (ASF)’s incubator in February 2021.
